text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Põlva County | settlement_type = County of Estonia | image_skyline = Ahja tiik 2.jpg | image_flag = Põlvamaa_lipp.svg | flag_size = 125px | image_shield = Põlvamaa_vapp.svg | shield_size = 75px | image_map = Põlva County in Estonia.svg | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Estonia | seat_type = Capital | seat = Põlva | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | area_total_km2 = 2164.77 | population_total = 28,507 | population_as_of = Jan 2017 |population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | registration_plate = O | iso_code = EE-65 | website = | footnotes = }} Põlva County is a county in Estonia. The capital city is also named Põlva. The county is divided into municipalities. There are 3 rural municipalities in Põlva County.
